attributes.action: Label all meat as stunned or not stunned prior to slaughter.
attributes.additional_details: Approximately 3.3m Muslims living in Britain who demand Halal meat but we have no labelling to determine which is and which is not Halal.
attributes.background: Animals are frequently cruelly slaughtered (e.g. Halal and Kosher) without first being stunned. Consumers should have labelling which gives them choice.
